question_text: The 73rd Constitution Amendment Act, 1992 refers to the
option_1_text: Generation of gainful employment for the unemployed and the under-employed in rural areas.
option_2_text: Generation of employment for able-bodied adults in need and desirous of work during the lean agricultural season.
option_3_text: Laying the foundation for strong and vibrant Panchayati Raj institutions.
option_4_text: Right to life, liberty and security of person, equality before law and equal protection without discrimination.
answer_explanation_text: 73rd Amendment Act added Eleventh Schedule to the Constitution and Part IX, which provides for the Panchayati Raj System.
